message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.NE 

The paper proposes a novel pooling scheme for action recognition based on learning decision hyperplanes using SVMs. This involves using CNN features and multiple instance learning, which are commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) research. The paper also involves optimization and efficient solvers, which are relevant to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and numerical analysis (cs.NE). Finally, the paper evaluates its approach on standard action recognition datasets (cs.MM).
